narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection. 
 
Facility inspection was conducted on 14 September. Document review and subsequent exit interview was
conducted on 17 September with the attending veterinarian, IACUC administrator, and various facility personnel by
Scott Welch, VMO, and Kathy Campitelli, VMO.
